project.name: munit
project.description: MassiveUnit is a cross-platform haXe unit testing framework from Massive Interactive that utilises haxe metadata markup for test cases and includes tools for generating, compiling and running test cases from the command line.
project.version: 1) Added -debug flag to command line tool to run only tests marked with @TestDebug. 2) Switched to using monospace font when printing results in browser. 3) Now removes old test runner files not being executed in latest test run.
